channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Rhapsody Design Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Rhapsody Design Manager

item.title: CVE-2017-1249|2024-08-05T13:25:17.509Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session.

item.title: CVE-2017-1559|2024-08-05T13:39:31.588Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: Multiple IBM Rational products could disclose sensitive information by an attacker that intercepts vulnerable requests. IBM X-Force ID: 131758.

item.title: CVE-2017-1245|2024-08-05T13:25:17.561Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Software Architect Design Manager 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 124580.

item.title: CVE-2018-1535|2024-08-05T04:07:43.378Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Rhapsody Design Manager 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.5 and IBM Rational Software Architect Design Manager 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.1 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 124557.

item.title: CVE-2017-1462|2024-08-05T13:32:30.189Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 5.0 and 6.0 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 128461.

item.title: CVE-2017-1509|2024-08-05T13:32:29.877Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Jazz Foundation products could allow an authenticated user to obtain sensitive information from a stack trace that could be used to aid future attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 129719.

item.title: CVE-2017-1287|2024-08-05T13:32:28.415Z -- ibm -- rational%20rhapsody%20design%20manager
item.description: IBM Rhapsody DM 5.0 and 6.0 could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim.
